description: Detects defence evasion attempt via odbcconf.exe execution to load DLL
author: Kirill Kiryanov
Beyu Denis
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
false_positives: Legitimate use of odbcconf.exe by legitimate user
name: Application Whitelisting Bypass via DLL Loaded by odbcconf.exe
query: (((((process.executable.text:*\\odbcconf.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"odbcconf.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:(*\-a* OR *\-f* OR *\/a* OR *\/f* OR *regsvr*))) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:*\\odbcconf.exe AND process.executable.text:*\\rundll32.exe)))
